SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package data

Class ApplicationRepository

java.lang.Object
data.ApplicationRepository
public class ApplicationRepository extends Object
Repository class responsible for the persistence and retrieval of Internship Applications. This class manages the collection of applications, allowing for storing, updating, deleting, and querying applications based on various criteria (Student, Internship, Status, etc.).

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationRepository

      public ApplicationRepository()
      Constructs a new ApplicationRepository. Initializes the internal storage list.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public Application save(Application application)
      Saves a new application to the repository.
      Parameters:
      application - The application object to persist.
      Returns:
      The saved application object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the application object is null.

    • findAll

      public List<Application> findAll()
      Retrieves all applications currently stored in the repository.
      Returns:
      A new list containing all applications (read-only copy).

    • findById

      public Application findById(String applicationId)
      Finds a specific application by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The unique ID string.
      Returns:
      The Application object if found, or null otherwise.

    • findByStudentId

      public List<Application> findByStudentId(String studentId)
      Retrieves all applications submitted by a specific student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      Returns:
      A list of applications belonging to that student.

    • findByInternshipTitle

      public List<Application> findByInternshipTitle(String internshipTitle)
      Retrieves all applications associated with a specific internship title.
      Parameters:
      internshipTitle - The title of the internship.
      Returns:
      A list of applications for that internship.

    • findByStatus

      public List<Application> findByStatus(ApplicationStatus status)
      Retrieves all applications that currently match a specific status.
      Parameters:
      status - The ApplicationStatus to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of matching applications.

    • findByStudentAndStatus

      public List<Application> findByStudentAndStatus(String studentId, ApplicationStatus status)
      Retrieves applications for a specific student that match a specific status.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      status - The status to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of matching applications.

    • findPendingWithdrawalRequest

      public List<Application> findPendingWithdrawalRequest()
      Finds all applications where a withdrawal has been requested but not yet finalized. Used by Career Center Staff to approve or reject withdrawals.
      Returns:
      A list of applications with pending withdrawal requests.

    • update

      public Application update(Application application)
      Updates an existing application in the repository. Finds the application by ID and replaces it with the new object.
      Parameters:
      application - The application with updated data.
      Returns:
      The updated application object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the application is null or does not exist.

    • delete

      public boolean delete(String applicationId)
      Deletes an application from the repository.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The unique ID of the application to remove.
      Returns:
      true if found and deleted; false otherwise.

    • countActiveApplicationsByStudent

      public int countActiveApplicationsByStudent(String studentId)
      Counts the number of active applications for a specific student. An application is considered active if it is not withdrawn and not unsuccessful. This is used to enforce the limit of 3 active applications.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      Returns:
      The count of active applications.

    • countSuccessfulApplicationByInternship

      public int countSuccessfulApplicationByInternship(String internshipTitle)
      Counts the number of successful applications for a specific internship. This is used to calculate how many slots have been filled.
      Parameters:
      internshipTitle - The title of the internship.
      Returns:
      The count of successful applications.

    • hasSuccessfulApplication

      public boolean hasSuccessfulApplication(String studentId)
      Checks if a student has already secured an internship (has a SUCCESSFUL application).
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      Returns:
      true if the student has an accepted/successful application; false otherwise.
